about_the_game:
4 emblematic helmets from the Warhammer Fantasy universe are included in this pack, and can be used to upgrade your equipment.

The pack contains:
  • The helmet of the Archmage of Yvresse
  • A Death's Heads helmet
  • The helmet of Ungrim Ironfist
  • A Wild Riders helmet
detailed_description:
4 emblematic helmets from the Warhammer Fantasy universe are included in this pack, and can be used to upgrade your equipment.

The pack contains:
  • The helmet of the Archmage of Yvresse
  • A Death's Heads helmet
  • The helmet of Ungrim Ironfist
  • A Wild Riders helmet

name: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Helmet Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only

short_description: This pack contains 4 emblematic helmets from the Warhammer Fantasy universe.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
